document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">None </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">saw </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">ever </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">told </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">hid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">Death </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">specific </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">treasure </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">departing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">breath </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">Surfaces </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">may </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6"> </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">invested </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Diamond </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">grow </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">General </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">Dandelion </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">serve </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: None who saw it ever told it
